author: cutting
msg: Upgrade to latest Hadoop jar.  Add job names to Nutch mapred jobs.  Update OutputFormat implementations to implement new checkOutputSpecs() method.

author: cutting
msg: Move checking of output directory existence from JobClient to OutputFormat, so that it can be overridden.  Add a base class for OutputFormat that implements this new method.
